About

My name is Rogin. I’m a senior drama major at Vassar College, where I do mostly design and technical theater. In my free time I like to write and design and build web sites.

After a few years of teaching myself, I have a pretty good handle on HTML, CSS, SASS, and Wordpress. I’m comfortable with PHP and Javascript, and I’m getting better all the time.

Whether I’m creating for the page or the stage, I’m passionate about expression and story-telling. I’m excited by the communication of ideas and emotion through performance, text, and design.

What is this about?

To be honest, I’m not sure yet. I like reading about and talking about tech, Apple, and design, so I’m sure you’ll see a lot of that here. I can bet that a few of my other interests will slip in here, be it theater, productivity hacks, eating paleo, strength training, and well-being.

If you’d like to get updates from me, sign up for blog posts via email (I promise, no spam!), or follow me on Twitter, or grab my RSS feed if that’s your thing.

Colophon

I designed and built this site with Jekyll, Github Pages for hosting, Sublime Text, Sass, Compass, and Typekit. All copy is set in Ratio, except for the code blocks, which is set in Source Code Pro. Feel free to check out the style guide.

Rogin Farrer

Senior drama major at Vassar College, designer, and writer.
I enjoy story-telling, technology, and good coffee.
